channel.title: Unnatural Acts of Opera
channel.description: parterre box, the queer opera zine, presents extraordinary opera performances, one act at a time. Hosted by La Cieca, cultural doyenne at parterre box.
channel.itunes:subtitle: parterre box, the queer opera zine, presents extraordinary opera performances, one act at a time. Hosted by La Cieca, cultural doyenne at parterre box.
channel.itunes:summary: parterre box, the queer opera zine, presents extraordinary opera performances, one act at a time. Hosted by La Cieca, cultural doyenne at parterre box.

item.title: Lucia di Lammermoor (Donizetti) Act 1
item.description: Miss Lucia: Maria Callas; Sir Edgardo di Ravenswood: Giuseppe di Stefano; Lord Enrico Asthon: Rolando Panerai; Raimondo Bidebent: Nicola Zaccaria; Lord Arturo Buclaw: Giuseppe Zampieri; Alisa: Luisa Villa; Normanno: Mario Carlin. Coro del Teatro alla Scala di Milano; RIAS Sinfonie-Orchester Berlin; condutor Herbert von Karajan. Berlin, Staedtische Oper, September 29, 1955.
item.author: lacieca@parterre.com (La Cieca)
item.itunes:author: La Cieca
item.itunes:subtitle: Berlin, Staedtische Oper, September 29, 1955

item.title: Semiramide (Rossini) Act 2
item.description: Joan Sutherland (Semiramide); Giulietta Simionato (Arsace); Wladimiro Ganzarolli (Assur); Gianni Raimondi (Idreno); Ferruccio Mazzoli (Oroe); Giuseppe Bertinazzo (Mitrane); Manuela Bianchi Porro (Azema); Antonio Zerbini (L'ombra di Nino). Orchestra e coro del Teatro alla Scala; Gabriele Santini. Milano, Teatro alla Scala, 17 December 1962.
item.author: lacieca@parterre.com (La Cieca)
item.itunes:author: La Cieca
item.itunes:subtitle: Teatro alla Scala, 17 December 1962

item.title: La forza del destino (Verdi) Part 3
item.description: Leonora: Zinka Milanov; Don Alvaro: Mario del Monaco; Don Carlo: Leonard Warren; Padre Guardiano: William Wilderman; Preziosilla: Claramae Turner; Marquis of Calatrava: Norman Treigle; Fra Melitone: Gerhard Pechner; Curra: Rosemary Rotolo; Surgeon: Donald Bernard; Beggar Woman: Lydia Neuman. Orchestra and Chorus of the New Orleans Opera Walter Herbert, conductor. March 1953.
item.author: lacieca@parterre.com (La Cieca)
item.itunes:author: La Cieca
item.itunes:subtitle: March 1953

item.title: Belisario (Donizetti) Act 3
item.description: Belisario: Giuseppe Taddei; Antonina: Leyla Gencer; Irene: Mirna Pecile; Alamiro: Umberto Grilli; Eutropio: Bruno Sebastian; Giustiniano: Nicola Zaccaria; Eudora: Rina Pallini; Eusebio: Giovanni Antonini; Ottario: Augusto Veronese; Centurion: Alberto Carusi. Gianandrea Gavazzeni, Teatro La Fenice di Venezia. May 14, 1969.

item.title: Jenufa (Janacek) Act 3
item.description: Jenufa: Gabriela Benackova; Kolstelnicka: Leonie Rysanek; Grandmother Buryja: Barbara Schramm; Laca Klemen: Wieslaw Ochman; Steva Buryja; Peter Kazaras; Jano: Katherine Johnson; Karolka: Kathryn Cowdrick; Starek, the Foreman: Kenneth Shaw; Mayor: Frank Barr; Mayor's Wife: Nikki Li Hartliep; Old Shepherdess/Aunt: Maro Partamian; Barena: Ariel Rubstein. Opera Orchestra of New York, Eve Queler. Carnegie Hall, March 30, 1988.
item.author: lacieca@parterre.com (La Cieca)
item.itunes:author: La Cieca
item.itunes:subtitle: March 30, 1988

item.title: Salome (R. Strauss)
item.description: Narraboth: George Shirley; Jokanaan: Norman Bailey; Salome: Birgit Nilsson; Herodes: Ragnar Ulfung; Herodias: Ruth Hesse; Page: Sandra Walker. Carnegie Hall, New York. December 18, 1974. The Chicago Symphony Orchestra, Sir Georg Solti.

item.title: Adriana Lecouvreur (Cilea) Act 4
item.description: Magda Olivero (Adriana Lecouvreur), Giulietta Simionato (Principessa di Bouillon), Franco Corelli (Maurizio), Ettore Bastianini (Michonnet), Antonio Cassinelli (L'Abate di Chazeuil), Augusto Frati (Quinault), Renato Ercolani (Poisson), Rosanna Zerbini (Jouvenot), Anna di Stasio (Dangeville). Orchestra & Chorus del Teatro di San Carlo, Naples; Mario Rossi, conductor. 28 November 1959.
item.author: lacieca@parterre.com (La Cieca)

item.itunes:subtitle: 28 November 1959
